name: Mini Professor Mew
description:
Double-click to summon this mini to follow you around. Only one mini may be in use at a time.
Combine 3 of this mini with a Pile of Crystalline Dust, an Obsidian Shard, and an Amber Quantic Dipole (dropped by creatures in scale 1â€“20 fractals) in the Mystic Forge to create a Mini Mister Mittens.
